Ilya Sutskever, former chief scientist at OpenAI, has revealed his next major project after departing the AI research company he co-founded in May. Alongside fellow OpenAI alumnus Daniel Levy and Apple’s former AI lead Daniel Gross, the trio has formed Safe Superintelligence Inc. (SSI), a startup solely focused on building safe superintelligent systems. The formation... Read more »

The post OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever’s new startup aims for ‘safe superintelligence’ appeared first on
title: OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever’s new startup aims for ‘safe superintelligence’
